item.title: Microsoft Entra ID flaw allowed hijacking any company's tenant
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: A critical combination of legacy components could have allowed complete access to the Microsoft Entra ID tenant of every company in the world. [...]

item.title: Canada dismantles TradeOgre exchange, seizes $40 million in crypto
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police has shut down the TradeOgre cryptocurrency exchange and seized more than $40 million believed to originate from criminal activities. [...]

item.title: Microsoft starts rolling out Gaming Copilot on Windows 11 PCs
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has begun rolling out the beta version of its AI-powered Gaming Copilot to Windows 11 systems for users aged 18 or older, excluding those in mainland China. [...]

item.title: FBI warns of cybercriminals using fake FBI crime reporting portals
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The FBI warned today that cybercriminals are impersonating its Internet Crime Complaint Center (IC3) website in what the law enforcement agency described as "possible malicious activity." [...]

item.title: CISA exposes malware kits deployed in Ivanti EPMM attacks
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) has published an analysis of the malware deployed in attacks exploiting vulnerabilities affecting Ivanti Endpoint Manager Mobile (EPMM). [...]

item.title: Fortra warns of max severity flaw in GoAnywhere MFT’s License Servlet
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Fortra has released security updates to patch a maximum severity vulnerability in GoAnywhere MFT's License Servlet that can be exploited in command injection attacks. [...]

item.title: Known. Emerging. Unstoppable? Ransomware Attacks Still Evade Defenses
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by Picus Security
item.description: Ransomware remains one of the most destructive threats—because defenses keep failing. Picus Blue Report 2025 shows prevention dropped to 62%, while data exfiltration prevention collapsed to just 3%. [...]

item.title: Steam will stop running on Windows 32-bit in January 2026
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Valve has announced that its Steam digital distribution service will drop support for 32-bit versions of Windows starting January 2026. [...]

item.title: OpenAI's $4 GPT Go plan may expand to more regions
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: .OpenAI released $4 GPT Go in August, but it was limited to just India. Now, OpenAI is expanding GPT Go to include new regions. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT Search is now smarter as OpenAI takes on Google Search
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI has rolled out a big update to ChatGPT Search, which is an AI-powered search feature, similar to Google AI Mode. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT now gives you greater control over GPT-5 Thinking model
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: OpenAI is finally rolling out a toggle that allows you to decide how hard the GPT-5-thinking model can think. This feature is rolling out to Plus and Pro subscribers. [...]
